name: Qudian
author: qudianso

sections.description:
Qudian is similar to social bookmarking services with addition of keyword selection. Qudian helps users to share reading clues by adding and liking Qudians. Users can login using their social networking sites (for now, Sina Weibo is supported). In addition, users build personal interest index over time. Qudian augments reading experience by promoting collaborative reading and enhancing reading efficiency.

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Search for qudian in https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins and download the plugin as zip file
  2. login to wp-admin, choose plugin section, upload the zip file, and install the qudian plugin
  3. Qudian should be up and running automatically

Alternatively, one can try the following steps.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.

short_description: Qudian enables marking and sharing keywords on web pages. These keywords (namely Qudians) are used to locate information and share interests.
